notesStmt.note: Title supplied by cataloger, on the basis of the following passage on f. 1r: "... brahmavidyāyāḥ sāvitryā gāyatryāḥ kalpoktaṁ." Title Gāyatrīpuraścaraṇavidhi supplied on the acquisition wrapper label, under which name the ms. was cataloged by Poleman.
Good condition. Paper apparently trimmed on margins, for marginal writing such as pagination indications are cut off on edges. Mistakes blotched out with black. Marginal corrections.

Begins: śrīgurubhyo namaḥ ācamya prāṇān āyamya sumukhaś cetyādi śrī* prītyarthaṁ amukagotrotpasya amukaśarmaṇaḥ mama iha janmani janmāntare ca vāṅmanaḥkāyakṛtānāṁ mahāpātakasamastapātakānāṁ aharahaḥ
Text ends (f. 3v): siddhir bhavatu me deva tvat prasādān maheśvara anena matkṛtena amu[ra]kasaṁkhyājapena bhagavān śrīparameśvaraḥ prīyatāṁna mama
Colophon (f. 3v): śake 1752 p[l]avanāma savat caitre māse śuklapakṣe tithiḥ 2 bhṛguvāsare* likitaṁ sarasvatiprasann śr[ī]ḥ
